directions: In large skillet, cook beef over medium heat until done.  Drain.  Add tomato sauce, olives, Parmesan cheese, seasoned salt, garlic powder, and oregano.  Simmer 15 minutes.
Cook pasta in a large pot of boiling water until done.  Drain.
Please mostaccioli in a shallow, 3 quart baking dish.  Toss with butter or margarine.  Pour meat sauce over, and top with shredded mozzarella.
Broil for 2 to 3 minutes, or until cheese melts.
ingredients: 1 cup black olives, pitted and sliced
title: Mostaccioli Mosta
